location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Jonathan Duncan, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a copy of a communication from Aga Mohumed Hussun and extracts from his reply; neither of which are present with this letter. However, a translation of the Resident's reply can be found with the previous letter (see ff. 45-46v).
